text: (Appotu avar musavitam) kurinar; "nir enakku ettu antukal velai ceyyaventum enra nipantanaiyin mitu, ennutaiya ivviru penkalil oruvarai umakku manamutittuk kotukka niccayamaka nan natukiren - ayinum, nir pattu (antukal) purtti ceytal, atu um viruppam; nan umakku ciramattai kotukka virumpavillai. Insa allah, ennai nallavarkalil ullavaraka kanpir
